title: Unsupported 16-Bit Application.
body:
{{champion:412}} Hi, Summoners

I'm struggling with an issue on hand and, quite frankly there's very limited information out there in solving this problem. Have anyone overcame this issue? I have reinstalled it 5 times, repaired it, run as administrator, and ran troubleshoot compatibility tools. No luck yet, but at this moment I'm still researching. This happened since the new client released. Any help is greatly appreciated, thanks!<3


The program or feature '/??/C;\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe' cannot start or run due to incompatibility with 64-bit versions of Windows. Please contact the software vendor to ask if a 64- bit Windows compatible version is available.

replies.body:
{{champion:412}} Hey, fellow Summoners!

There's a way to solve this, the wonderful specialists helped me find the light and now I'm back on League of Legends again. 


Thanks to Rufio and Broporo from Tech Team

 \o/
Here's the method.                                                                      v



Hey there iDakkoku, Rufio here from the Tech Team. Thanks for reaching out to us and sending out those logs!

It sounds like you've done a ton of stuff to try and fix it, whoa. I definitely appreciate you taking the initiative like that. 16-bit applications died out during the DOS days over a decade ago, so that's a bogus error message haha. With the logs you sent out though, that'll help quite a bit.

I saw Avast anti-virus running in your process list. Just for now, can you uninstall it? That way, we can rule it out as causing an issue. After the investigation, you're definitely free to re-install it. Here's how to remove Avast.

Going through the older game logs on the 23 and 24th, it looked like file corruption was starting to take over. I know you've re-installed it already, but let's go all the way by nuking League completely and wiping the slate clean with a super thorough re-installation (important step bolded for ya):

Uninstall LoL by going to Control Panel > Programs > Uninstall a program.

Once it's uninstalled, download and run a free recommended utility program called CCleaner: https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner

Delete the entire C:\Riot Games folder.

In CCleaner, go to the Registry tab and run the Registry Cleaner to scan for any additional leftover LoL files. (I've attached a quick image for reference)

Click on Fix Selected Issues, back up the changes if you'd like, and click on Fix All Selected Issues.

Restart the computer to be safe.

If you don't have a copy of the installer EXE, you can download it here or head to our site and download it there.

IMPORTANT: Right-click on the installer EXE and click on "Run as administrator".

Reinstall LoL (Verify that you are installing to this directory (it is the default one): C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)
Let me know how it goes! Send over a brand new LoL Logs.zip file if you're still having trouble. Thanks!

Rufio
Leader of the Lost Boys
Riot Games Player Support

                                                                                                                                                                                      -Thanks, again!




Here you go, guys.
I'm so glad you guys are able to play again too. Good luck, Summoners! Cheers
this actually worked thanks a ton
{{champion:412}} I'm happy to hear that, HF summoner!
hi pls help i have same problem with 64 bit wersion ... tryed what i write ,nothing helps :(

{{champion:412}} It's been 2 months since you posted and I just saw this right now so sorry I couldn't get to you sooner, but hopefully your league started working again. Try the steps again and if it's still not working then contact league tech support to run through another process. Good luck man I believe.

Thanks so much!!! My wife found this thread for me and it worked. Even tech support couldn't seem to help.
{{champion:150}}

Typically that kind of error pops up due to some weird admin priveledges or permission settings. It sounds like you've tried almost all the troubleshooting steps I'd suggest at first, so let's go ahead and get you a little more one on one help. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will be able to take a much closer look!

Thanks, Broporo.

I will do just that.

-Cheers
i was in promo and this shit ..... i am doing what u said. i hope it will work
